answerText: A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man[10] This author created Stephen Dedalus in A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man. Stephen also appears in his novel Ulysses.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Dartmouth A Round 13 | 15 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this novel befriends Cranly at university, and he falls in love with Emma Clery. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel whose protagonist becomes a pious Catholic after hearing a fire and brimstone sermon delivered by Father Arnall.
